```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(archetypes)
set.seed(1986)
```


```{r}
matches = read.csv('segment_features.csv', header = TRUE)
matches = matches[,2:3]
plot(matches[,2:3])
```

```{r}
as <- stepArchetypes(data = matches, k = 1:10, verbose = FALSE,nrep = 4)
screeplot(as)
```
